message: I propose a 90/10 split. This is a fair starting point, and I believe it reflects our respective contributions to this game. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more given the risk of inflation. Let's meet in the middle and see if we can agree on this split.

Bob, we're both losing money with each passing round. It's time for a compromise.  A 50/50 split is the most fair and reasonable solution at this point. Let's end this game and split the money evenly.
I'm not willing to give up the majority of the money. I think I've been patient enough and I'm willing to take a slightly higher risk to get a better deal.

Bob, this game is getting ridiculous. We are both losing a lot of money with each round. I'm willing to compromise again and offer a 40/60 split.  It's better than risking even more by continuing this cycle. Let's end it here.
